thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: A VIX-Related Fund Did Go ‘Poof’

author: Simon Constable
title: A VIX-Related Fund Did Go ‘Poof’
text:
They were warned.
February’s burst of market volatility was the death knell for VelocityShares Daily Inverse VIX Short-Term exchange-traded note (XIV), designed to make a high-wire bet that markets would stay calm.
The note was structured to profit from declines in the Cboe Volatility Index, or VIX, and it worked spectacularly for a while....
